name: Tejas Singh Rawat
role: Business Process Analyst | Agile Delivery & Digital Transformation Specialist
description: Tailored to your experience in digital transformation, software implementation, Agile delivery, stakeholder management, and driving technology solutions across SaaS and enterprise environments

cards.back: I'm a strategic Business Process Analyst and Certified Scrum Master with 3+ years of experience delivering 40+ technology transformation and software implementation initiatives in SaaS environments. I specialize in Agile delivery, stakeholder management, and aligning business and IT objectives. At WFX, I led 40+ EU digital transformation projects, achieving 98% CSAT and reducing post-launch issues by 50% through Agile practices. At Qualtrics, I developed GenAI integration strategies projecting 20% efficiency gains and resolved 30+ operational issues, reducing delivery delays by 25%. At ReaDI Watch, I delivered GTM strategies that boosted acquisition by 13% and built Power BI dashboards driving 5% churn reduction. I hold an MSc in Management Consultancy from UCD and excel at translating complex technical concepts into actionable strategies that drive efficiency and strong client outcomes.

My core strengths are strategic thinking, stakeholder alignment, and delivering measurable business impact through technology solutions. I excel at bridging business and technical teams—at Qualtrics, I coordinated across global stakeholders and developers, resolving 30+ operational issues and reducing delays by 25%. I'm skilled in Agile delivery using JIRA, sprint planning, and UAT, which helped me cut post-launch issues by 50% at WFX. I have strong analytical capabilities, building Power BI dashboards and data-driven business cases that accelerate investment decisions. I'm also excellent at client engagement, having delivered 100+ workshops and resolved 1,000+ support tickets while maintaining a 98% CSAT score.

I sometimes take on too much ownership of cross-functional initiatives, wanting to ensure every detail is perfect. While this drives thorough outcomes, I've learned to delegate more effectively and trust team members' expertise. By setting clear roles and using Agile ceremonies to maintain visibility, I've improved my ability to empower teams while staying focused on strategic priorities rather than getting caught in execution details.

cards.front: Why do you want to join us?
cards.back: I'm drawn to organizations that value strategic technology transformation and customer-centric solutions. Your focus on innovation, scalable delivery, and impactful digital products aligns perfectly with my background in software implementation, Agile delivery, and digital transformation across SaaS environments. I'm excited about opportunities where I can apply my skills in stakeholder management, process optimization, and technology roadmapping to drive business outcomes while continuing to grow in strategic program delivery.

cards.front: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?
cards.back: In five years, I see myself as a Senior Program Manager or Product Strategy Lead driving large-scale digital transformation initiatives. I want to deepen my expertise in technology strategy, product management, and organizational change while leading cross-functional teams delivering enterprise-scale solutions. I'm particularly interested in roles that combine strategic business thinking with hands-on delivery, where I can mentor teams and shape how technology drives business value.

cards.front: Tell me about a time you went above and beyond
cards.back: Situation: At WFX, we had 40+ complex digital transformation projects running simultaneously for high-value EU clients with tight deadlines. Task: Ensure on-time delivery while maintaining high client satisfaction and solution quality. Action: I went beyond project management by proactively translating 100+ business objectives into detailed functional requirements, conducting 100+ client workshops for deep engagement, and implementing rigorous Agile practices with UAT and sprint planning. I also established a robust support process handling 1,000+ tickets personally. Result: Achieved 98% CSAT score, reduced implementation errors by 5%, cut post-launch issues by 50%, and ensured 100% on-time delivery across the portfolio.

cards.front: How do you handle tight deadlines?
cards.back: I use Agile methodologies to break work into manageable sprints, prioritize ruthlessly based on business value, and maintain constant stakeholder communication. At WFX, I managed 40+ simultaneous projects using JIRA for sprint planning and tracking, which accelerated development cycles and reduced post-launch issues by 50%. I create detailed project plans, identify risks early, and coordinate across teams to resolve blockers quickly—as demonstrated at Qualtrics where I reduced delivery delays by 25% through proactive issue resolution.

cards.front: Describe a time you took initiative
cards.back: Situation: At Qualtrics, Pre-Sales processes were manual and inefficient, with emerging GenAI technologies presenting opportunities. Task: Identify transformation opportunities and drive strategic change. Action: I proactively developed comprehensive technology transformation strategies integrating GenAI into Pre-Sales workflows. I built governance models, created data-driven business cases, and developed technology roadmaps for 5+ initiatives. I coordinated with global stakeholders to ensure alignment and accelerate investment decisions. Result: Projected 20% efficiency gains and 35% reduction in manual workload, with 100% of initiatives aligned to strategic objectives, demonstrating both strategic thinking and execution capability.
